data.actual_result: Space between first and third line is missing.
data.expected_result: Empty line should be shown after the first line. Although empty line doesn't seem to be supported for iOS, at least space should be shown.
data.short_description: Channel topic compresses description with empty lines and Markdown formatting
data.steps_to_repro: - Have/create a channel topic with the following conditions (see attached picture for an example): - First line of channel topic with normal text without Markdown formatting - Second line of channel topic is an empty line - Third line of channel topic uses Markdown formatting (for example bold text)
